@everyone: The translation for the bonus pages can be found, here: https://nhentai.net/g/236564/

@hotrod1112: Haha. I'm sure I'm not Japanese. But it was easier this time around because when translating the second part, I became immensely familiar with Japanese characters and Kanji. And my years of watching hentai already made me familiar with Japanese phrases. The story is that Kyouko received a phone call from her sister, and during this phone call, she and sister reminisce about the last year. During this conversation, Kyouko's sister is going through the events of the last year which from her perspective are seemingly innocent. For Kyouko however, the conversation is riddled with innuendo. (You can tell with some her responses where she slightly stutters.) The conversation is filled with double meanings--like the reason Kouhei would wake early in the morning, her cleaning up everyday, and her tutoring him, while the panels gave us the real reason. This in my opinion is genius storytelling. And I honestly was impressed when translating it.

@Acronyx_Cipher: I didn't find it. It was given to me by the scanlator, who I've been communicating with for the last month. I didn't want to give an exact date because even he didn't know when he'd get it up online. Don't worry, it'll be up on hitomi.la soon, and nhentai later tonight (It'll take too long for me to upload.) I've already translated the first page of the bonus, so look forward to that.
The COMIC is  OUT! I'll be working on it as soon as possible.

@haise01: I completely agree with you. Part of this doujinshi's appeal is as you mentioned, the "escalation," which I think these hentai sites should really consider making a tag. It's the build up in that the situation starts with smaller indiscretions (i.e. starting with a handjob, then a blowjob.) And then when you think it couldn't get more nuanced they build up from emotionless "humping" to all-out sex with facials, cumming in between her tits, and pretty much marking her entire body with his spunk. I also like her conceived personality: she's a bit aloof, nonchalant, stoic, and mostly passive, making her go along with any sexual request her nephew has. (She also has a tomboyish demeanor which bolsters her sex appeal.) And there are subtle and overt hints which indicate that she was into the sexual relationship between herself and her nephew in parts 1 and 2. This really is a great doujinshi.

@zecox: I was against Haruna Hana at first, but she's grown on me. I agree that she's the best candidate since I can't really imagine anyone else performing as well as she has thus far. (Though perhaps, that's just my bias.) As for the release of the second part of the live action, it's set to release on August 31, 2018.

I'm actually reworking Immoral Garden to provide a cleaner look and better fonts. I don't know when I'll be done with that, but I'll keep you guys posted.

@hotrod1112: With cc0dykid's version, I noticed a lot of spelling and translation errors. It appeared to be more of a "rush order" than one of the more common translations we see. I didn't do it for popularity. I did it because this doujinshi has easily become one of my favorites, and I wanted to read it in its best version. It's the reason I worked hard on translating it accurately, make the color more vibrant, and even adding some of the sound effects. Barring any health issue, I intend to add my translation and subsik's to the comic, as well as translate the bonus. I'll show it even more care than I showed this volume. And thanks for the support, man.

@hotrod1112: Kuroneko Smith's works are quite unique as far as doujinshi go since, as I mentioned before, it's like a Japanese AV made into a comic. (That's the reason it was easy to convert it to live-action.) So finding something similar is quite hard. If anything will do, then I would suggest "Boyoku" by PIero. For aunt mangas, I like "Youkoso Greenwood" (my third favorite aunt series) by Kurokoshi You. I've also stumbled across "Batsuichi Onna no Yuutsu" by Jitsuma. If you're looking for a multi-part series, there's "Sweet Days" by Takasugi Kou | I don't know of any other series that has a live action.

I know it's not the typical manga, but he's written it as though it were a Japanese AV. In my opinion, this is a more realistic conclusion. Kouhei is at best 13 years old, she loves her husband despite her cheating him, and their pairing other than her serving as a guide to his sexual maturation doesn't make much sense. Just like in his previous work, the son doesn't tell his mom that he impregnated her and that he's in love with her. But don't fret, hotrod1112, the 10 page bonus episode may offer something typical, or at least what we're used to. From what I translated, Kyouko is a bit more proactive and solicitous. (I know I wrote a lot, but I was actually hoping to discuss the content of the manga with someone. Hope you don't mind. :).)

In the first volume, near the end, when he's sucking on her tits, rather than stop him immediately, she continues to jerk him off while blushing. And at the end of his first cumshot, she seemed to be in good spirits, praising his youth. This attitude changes only when he forces himself on her. In the second volume, in the beginning, she continues to compliment his energy, even taking a shot at her own husband. (It's pretty clear that she and her husband don't have sex regularly.) And probably as a habit of having sex with Kouhei, after that sex scene with her husband, she asks for another round, and seems disappointed when he can't offer it to her. Not to mention the escalation, where more and more, she's without clothes when she and Kouhei have sex. (To be continued...)

@hotrod1112: I know what you mean. Typically, in these type of stories, the aunt would relent and give in to her "inner urges." But that's not the writer Kuroneko Smith is. Based on his last two works, I've mostly assumed that Smith likes bitter-sweet endings. But, there are a lot of subtle hints that she, Kyouko, actually liked, or at the very least, was turned on by her affair with her nephew. The most glaring hint is that she masturbates while thinking of the previous times she and Kouhei had come into sexual contact. Even more to the point, she masturbates after giving him an intense blowjob in the kitchen, where they could've been caught. That at least lets me know that she was turned on by the blowjob she gave Kouhei, which happened to be in the same room as her sister, brother-in-law, and husband. (To be continued...)

Tnx im gonna wait for that comic.. the only problem with the sequel i was wrong when i was expecting the aunt liked it doin it with kohei when transalations went up damn the aunt wasnt even enjoyin it. Its like just a chore you know what i mean. Usually it ends up both enjoys it..thats the twist I guess..hehe

And I'm fairly certain it's going to be another 100+ page volume. The good thing is, the artwork gets better with every new project he takes on, so when it does come out, I'm sure it'll be worth the wait.

@everyone: once again, I apologize for this distracting exchange. I'm just easily vexed by unsubstantiated claims about the integrity behind translating this doujinshi. Both cc0dykid's and my translation exist (there's obviously no changing that) so everyone should feel free  to prefer either or both. And I should just find ease in the fact that there are others who know the truth, and I should stop taking the bait. Once again, thanks for the appreciation most of you have shown, and thanks for reading.

And if the accuracy of my translation is really up in question, I have no problem uploading the log file with every single line that I translated. I also have every conversation with the reddit translators documented. I've already cited the other sites I used. This doujinshi is popular no doubt. And this isn't the first of Kuroneko Smith's work to have more than one translation. But cc0dykid is in no position to claim that my translations are inaccurate, especially given the effort he put in his own translation. cc0dykid, if my translation is really sub-par, then the readers will find out eventually. If you're so confident in your translation, you would have no need to play the troll and engage in these childish games.

@everyone else: elfman7840 is actually cc0dykid. I can imagine no other member who'd go to such lengths to disparage another person's translation. He first claimed that his issue was with the false claim of "re-uploading" the doujinshi. And recently he has been bashing my release with pathetic attempts to sell it short, even though my translation is far more accurate than his. He says that this is my first project (Duh, I mention as much in the last page.) Once again, elfman7840 is actually cc0dykid in disguise. And now he's just trolling my release because he's upset that there's another translation, a more accurate translation that didn't use just google translate as a resource. This is pathetic, cc0dykid.
This is 8TB's first project. They used Google translate. This works translations are wrong.

This member, who commented below, is disturbed. It appears he (or she) has a particular emotional attachment to the idea of cc0dykid's version being the only translation. I have no problem if others prefer cc0dykid's; however, misinformation should never have sway. I've always been a diligent and meticulous worker. I don't half-ass anything, especially if it's a project I really like and to which I'm invested. I thought that this long anticipated volume deserved a more accurate translation and better presentation, and I worked hard to make it so. But, let your eyes be the judge.

@everyone else: it is apparent that there is one member who has no other intention but to troll my translation. In the interest of honesty, cc0dykid's translation is not 100% correct. (It's not even 90% correct.) If it were, I would not have even finished my translation. There's a plethora of errors, some which I already pointed out. I worked on this for two and a half months, with a particular focus on ACCURACY. And the changes I made were ADDED; they did not REPLACE. The original images are translated the exact same way for those who want the original.

Here's the original translation everyone: https://nhentai.net/g/222998/

The translations are far less jarring and 100% correct. No changes were made to the original work of Kuroneko Smith and the font is better imo ;)

Can anyone make out the characters after the "と," both times, in this preview picture kuroneko put up: https://i.imgur.com/5KViiXZ.png (denoised) and https://i.imgur.com/wi1EsYR.png (with noise)? Other differences would include: larger images (as I used the original pages,) better cleaning (no offense to Mr. Yoso,) color manipulation, fewer spelling errors, text within the boundaries of the speech bubbles, translation of more phonetics, cropping out the white lines found on the borders, re-purposed images (46, 76, and 107,) and in my opinion, a much better font. @elfman7840, cc0dykid's version is still on here, so if you prefer his, then by all means, read his version. No one's forcing you to read mine. I thought it was "necessary" because I like this series, and was willing to put the man hours into providing a more accurate and visually pleasing version. That's not to say that cc0dykid's version wasn't appreciated at the time.

An example of such differences can be found on page 76 and 77 of my version and page 75 on cc0dykid's, on the bottom left and right panels. cc0dykid translated that part as "I will take care of him for a while." This is incorrect. She makes no reference to her nephew in that translation. cc0dykid translated that part incorrectly. It's actually, "I'll be in your care for a while, Big Sister" which I changed to "From now on, I'll be in your care, Sis." On the bottom left panel, Kouhei's mother does not state "I can't wait to see your little baby" as cc0dykid translated. It's actuallly "That child was anxious to see you." She's making a reference to her son, Ko-chan. There are errors throughout his translation, e.g. in the previous page (Page 75 on mine, and 74 on his) he translates, "She's got a baby" which doesn't read well or make much sense. It's actually, "she's having a baby." (To be continued...)
